resources.string: Our bunny goes shopping! Try to buy rather expensive products to spend as much money as possible. Click on a product on the shelf to kick it directly into your shopping cart. If you miss, the product is lost. Also watch out for random warning signs. If you crash into them, you lose precious shopping time. Click on the signs in time to push them away. Let the shopping begin!

Click the products to kick them off the shelf directly into the shopping cart. Time it well! If you miss, the product is lost. Choose rather expensive products to spend as much money as possible. But be aware of quantity discounts if you buy too many products of the same type. Click the warning signs before you crashing into them.
